actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to amortize certain rehabilitation expenditures for certified historic structures which are not depreciable.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to amortize otherwise nondeductible rehabilitation expenditures for certified historic structures.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to amortize certain rehabilitation expenditures for certified historic structures which are not depreciable.
